name: Empty Prairie Field
description: A vast, sun-baked expanse of prairie grass, stretching towards the horizon under an indifferent sky. This is an undeveloped field, occasionally used for informal games of kick-the-can or for allowing livestock to graze. The only spectators are the circling buzzards and the ever-present dust motes dancing in the heat. It's a place of quiet desolation, where the dreams of glory are as fleeting as the shadows of passing clouds. To the north, a rough path leads towards the rudimentary schoolhouse.
